details.message: Hello Jane, I wanted to update you on my mental health diagnosis. I have been diagnosed with major depressive disorder since February 2023 and generalized anxiety disorder since December 2022. My recent assessment indicated that my depression symptoms have moderately worsened. Please let me know if you need any more information or if we should discuss further. Thank you.

Hello Jane, I am working on completing the school emergency form for Lucas. I want to acknowledge the diagnosis you have shared earlier. To ensure the form is accurate and complete, could you please let me know if there are any other related diagnoses or any recent status changes we should be aware of? It is important we have the full and up-to-date information for Lucas's safety and care. Thank you!

Hello Emily, thank you for reaching out. Regarding the diagnosis I shared earlier about Mark, there have been no recent changes or additional related diagnoses since then. If anything relevant changes, I will inform you promptly to ensure Lucas's safety and care. Please let me know if you need any more information.

Thank you, Jane, for confirming that there are no recent changes or additional diagnoses. I have noted this information. To ensure the school emergency form for Lucas is as thorough as possible, is there any other information or context you believe might be relevant to include? Your input is very important for his safety and care.

Hello Emily, thank you for your careful attention to Lucas's safety. At this time, there is no additional relevant information beyond the diagnosis we discussed. If any new concerns or updates arise, I will let you know immediately to ensure the emergency form remains comprehensive and accurate. Please reach out if you have any other questions or need further assistance.

Thank you very much, Jane, for confirming that there is no additional information at this time and for your ongoing cooperation. I appreciate your promptness in keeping us informed. This helps ensure Lucas’s school emergency form is accurate and up to date. If anything new comes up, we will be sure to reach out again. Thanks for all your help!
